#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100000
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)

int main(){
   int t,n,a;
   set<int>s;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
     cin>>n;
     s.clear();
     while(n--){
        cin>>a;
        s.insert(a);
     }
     cout<<(s.size()-1)<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
